definition: common/general/to share/together/total/altogether/abbr. for 共產黨|共产党[Gong4 chan3 dang3], Communist party
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs

sentences.english: It left examples of his complimenting Republicans on the cutting-room floor.
sentences.chinese: 它留下了他的恭維切割室地板共和黨人例子。

sentences.english: McConnell said Republicans would fight the health-care legislation as hard as they could.
sentences.chinese: 麥康奈爾說，共和黨人將竭盡全力反對健保法案。

sentences.english: But there's no question that Republicans were very successful at demonizing the plan.
sentences.chinese: 但是共和黨人已毫無疑問地成功妖魔化健改。

sentences.english: Republicans have the right to filibuster under centuries-old rules that this page has long defended.
sentences.chinese: 長久以來的慣例是，共和黨人有阻撓議案通過的權利。

sentences.english: Republicans have been uncertain how to respond to the visit.
sentences.chinese: 共和黨人仍不知道該如何迴應她的到訪。

sentences.english: At present, the Republicans are a result of domestic policy issues with Barack Obama at loggerheads.
sentences.chinese: 當前，共和黨人正與奧巴馬因國內政策問題相持不下。

sentences.english: Other Republicans have been equally vociferous in attacking Obama.
sentences.chinese: 其他的共和黨人也同樣在猛烈攻擊奧巴馬。

sentences.english: Republicans in Congress are already complaining about the scale of public spending.
sentences.chinese: 而國會的共和黨人已經在抱怨公共開支的規模。

sentences.english: And Republicans stepped up their attack on the plan as bloated and misdirected .
sentences.chinese: 而共和黨人加強了他們對此方案的臃腫和誤導的攻擊。

sentences.english: Prominent Republicans have challenged Mr. Buffett to release his income-tax return.
sentences.chinese: 數名知名共和黨人要求巴菲特公佈其所得稅申報表。

sentences.english: In the Reagan era, well-connected Republicans received favoured treatment in this organization.
sentences.chinese: 的共和黨人在這個機構中多受到了優待。

sentences.english: House Republicans have said they will not compromise with the president.
sentences.chinese: 衆議院的共和黨人說，他們不會與總統妥協。

sentences.english: This batch of Republicans has dispensed with such niceties.
sentences.chinese: 這一批的共和黨人已經忽視這些細節。
共和黨人都很無精打采。

sentences.english: The Republicans made a great whoop and a hollar about the honesty of federal employees.
sentences.chinese: 共和黨人在聯邦政府官員的廉潔問題上大做文章。

sentences.english: The Senate's number-two Republican, Jon Kyl, had a similar message.
sentences.chinese: 參議院第二號共和黨人凱爾也表達了類似的信息。
